name: plex-rewind
description: Plex-Rewind is a self-hosted tool that generates recap clips from shows in Plex. It extracts key scenes to create summaries, helping viewers refresh before watching the next episode.
features: Recap generation: Automatically create recap videos from previous episodes of TV shows.
Scene extraction: Identify and extract key scenes from episodes for summary content.
Plex integration: Connect to Plex Media Server to access and process library content.
Custom duration: Configure recap length to match your preferred summary duration.
Automated processing: Generate recaps automatically when new episodes are added to library.
Quality settings: Adjust video quality and compression for recap file size optimization.
Episode detection: Intelligently detect episode boundaries and important plot points.
Storage management: Configure where recap videos are stored and manage disk space usage.
Preview before saving: Review generated recaps to ensure quality before finalizing.
Batch processing: Create recaps for multiple episodes or entire seasons simultaneously.
Metadata integration: Add recap videos to Plex with proper metadata and thumbnails.
Scheduling: Set up automated recap generation on a schedule for new content.
